category: Human Rights Management Regulations/Article 15 (Protection of Human Rights of Local Residents)
contents: Article 15 (Protection of human rights of local residents) The Sports Association respects and protects the rights to life, freedom of movement of residence, rights to personal safety, and property rights of local residents in areas where business activities occur. [Moved from Article 10, previous version] Article 15 moved to Article 10 [November 7, 2019]
